ability.Endless Hunger: Restores HP equal to 25% of damage dealt with biting moves.
ability.Territorial Domination: Raises Attack by 1 stage when entering battle.

Devour.effect: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

Territorial Roar.effect: Lowers the Defense and Special Defense of all opponents by 1 stage.

Rampage.effect: Has a 30% chance to cause the user to become confused.
